name: HotBreakingNews
0:
”Alexa, launch Hot Breaking News”
”Alexa, open Hot Breaking News”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hot breaking news
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will alert you with a notification whenever something major takes place in the news. 

When you enable this skill, make sure that you turn on notifications.

This skill was built and is maintained on the witlingo platform. If you would like to launch a notification skill like this one, or any skill, please email us at info@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
